mapper.insert:
insert into coach_withdraw_reocrd
coach_id = #{coach_id},
withdraw_time = #{withdraw_time},
withdraw_amount = #{withdraw_amount},
drawee = #{drawee},
withdraw_status = #{withdraw_status},
validation = #{validation},
mapper.update: update coach_withdraw_reocrd set validation = 0 where withdraw_reocrd_id = #{withdraw_reocrd_id}
mapper.select: select * from coach_withdraw_reocrd where withdraw_reocrd_id = #{withdraw_reocrd_id} and validation = 1
mapper.update:
update coach_withdraw_reocrd
coach_id = #{coach_id},
withdraw_time = #{withdraw_time},
withdraw_amount = #{withdraw_amount},
drawee = #{drawee},
withdraw_status = #{withdraw_status},
validation = #{validation},
where withdraw_reocrd_id = #{withdraw_reocrd_id}
